ygData.msgSnippet: (If I haven t already I ll send you info on Razor Claw.) Razor claw transformed back to robot mode, his shoulder dripping blood. What have you done to me? he

(If I haven't already I'll send you info on Razor Claw.)

Razor claw transformed back to robot mode, his shoulder dripping 
blood. "What have you done to me?" he asked when he realized that he 
wasn't dripping mech fluid.

"You are part of a new breed of translife form." Veratis transformed 
back to robot mode and started bandaging the wound. " You are more 
organic than any bot on this planet with the exception of Ice." 
Foxfingers activated the clean up drones to take care of the mess. 
Veratis placed a cutter on Razor Claws chest and removed the Predacon 
symbol.

"AAAGH" The pain went through Razor Claw as the symbol was removed. 
He stumbled backwards ready to fall.

Lunarpine caught him under the arm and led him to the CR chamber. 
Razor Claw volentarily stepped in and the door closed. Veratis smiled 
as he looked in at the latest addition to thier group.

Razor Claw called for Ice to come closer. "I heard your name during 
the fight, Ice, It suits you well." he stared out at the prototype 
for his kind and smiled. 

(Got to go, Dinners in an hour and I have Potatos to finish.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (Yeah you did. Thanks)
> 
> Ice::
> She kept him pinned against the wall. She didn't want him to hurt 
> Lunarpine, but she let him down to the floor atleast. She was 
feeling 
> drained, but didn't want to take any riskes untill Veratis had one 
> him over. She was starting to sweat under her fur. This was taking 
> more out of her than she had planned on. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Razor Claw left his feat and his shield dissapaited, he again hit 
> the 
> > wall with a thud. "What weapon is this?" His confusion was 
matched 
> > only by his inability to move.
> > 
> > Lunarpine knew that she couldn't keep this up forever so he 
decided 
> > to end the fight. He charged forward and put his claws to the 
> > Raptor. "You can let him go now, he's not going anywhere."
> > 
> > Razorclaw was pinned and without his feat to ground him he 
couldn't 
> > activate his shield. "Ganging up on me? I thought Maximals fought 
> > fair." he stared at Lunarpine hoping for the chance to escape.
> > 
> > "To bad we aint your average maximal." Lunarpine stared right 
back 
> at 
> > him, The Raptor knew he wasn't kidding and looked away. "You win, 
> I'm 
> > your prisoner." The Predacon thought he was a POW, he didn't know 
> > that Veratis wasn't part of the war.
> > 
> > Veratis stepped forward, "Let him down Lunarpine, He's not 
> > responsible for his actions." Lunarpine let go and stepped 
> aside. "I 
> > think I have some explaining to do." He started his origin speech 
> and 
> > Razor Claw listened.
> > 
> > (Did I send you information on Veratis, Foxfingers, and Lady Hawk 
> > yet?)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > Ice::
> > > 
> > > She entered into Razar Claw's mind and saw him put up his 
> shields. 
> > > She still could use her abilities against him. She changed into 
> > > griffen mode without realizing it. She concentrated and pushed 
> him 
> > > against the wall with her mind.  She would hold him there and 
not 
> > let 
> > > him go. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > (His robot arms are his beast legs, His shoulders flip around 
> to 
> > > > become his thighs resulting in the catapult jump he used.)
> > > > 
> > > > Razor Claw put up an invisible shield to protect himself from 
> her 
> > > > pecks. He remained still, waiting to see what Ice did next.
> > > > 
> > > > Lunarpine saw the break in the action and took advantage. He 
> > > > transformed to his half wolf stage and dashed into the 
battle. 
> > > > Foxfingers rolled out and began scampering toward Lunarpine. 
> > > > Lunarpine grabbed the fox and pulled him to safety.
> > > > 
> > > > Veratis watched as the stalemate continued. The virus seemed 
to 
> > > have 
> > > > given Razor Claw extra abilities too. He catalogued each 
> movement 
> > > and 
> > > > each technique. Both were changed thanks to him, and both 
were 
> > > deadly.
> > > >
